body:
Fixes #14850.  Commit 6b1958219 added versions 2020 and 2020.1 for
intel-tbb as part of updating several intel packages but added the
wrong sha256 sums for the github/01org repository.

Also, version 2020 is 2020, not 2020.0.

Add patch makefile-debug to restore the debug targets.

----------

Please double check my sha256 sums.  Just a simple wget for 2020 and
2020.1 to make sure these are the right sha256 sums for the
github/01org repo.

@robert-mijakovic Where did you get the sha256 sums?  Were they from a
professional version of TBB or something?  Anyway, I think these are
correct for github/01org.
title: intel-tbb: fix sha256 sums for 2020 versions
